concept.title: Breakfast Sandwich
concept.shortdesc: Sandwiches aren't just meant for lunch anymore!

conbody.p: A Breakfast Sandwich is something that you make quickly that tastes good too! Typically, a Breakfast Sandwich is held together by some type of bread, whether it be whole wheat, and english muffin, or a bagel. You can put whatever fillings you want inside. Typically, the sandwich includes some time of protein paired with fresh veggies of your choice.
